title: A Beautiful and Compelling Kentucky Film
review: I was lucky enough to see this amazing film in theatres last July, and it was simply spectacular. Being a Kentuckian, I not only appreciated the beautiful locations chosen for the film, but the stunning cinematography used to emphasize our state's natural beauty. The film tells an intense and twisted love story that is unlike anything I've seen before. I would highly recommend watching this film, as getting to see it was one of the highlights of my summer.

title: WATCH THIS
review: If you like a true indie film, made with grit, then this is film for you. An obvious piece of art, with raw, chilling moments. A captivating tale of love, death and small town struggle. Do yourself a favor and give this a watch. Worth it.

title: Surprised with what I ended up watching
review: Didn't have any idea what I was going to see and I was surprised with how much I liked the film. Excellent pacing through the movie that makes this thriller more suspenseful and shocking as it goes deeper and deeper into the fire.
